### Working with Packages

------------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Installing Packages

```{r}
library("datasets", lib.loc="C:/Program Files/R/R-3.4.0/library")
```

```{r}
library(MASS)
```

#### Examining Data

Heads and tails

```{r}
head(airquality)
```

```{r}
tail(airquality)
```

Missing data

```{r}
mean(airquality$Ozone)
```

```{r}
mean(airquality$Ozone, na.rm=TRUE)
```

Subsets

```{r}
Month.Day.Ozone <- subset(airquality, select = c(Month,Day,Ozone))
```

```{r}
head(Month.Day.Ozone)
```

```{r}
August.Ozone <- subset(airquality, Month == 8, select = c(Month,Day,Ozone))
```

```{r}
head(August.Ozone)
```

#### R Formulas

```{r}
analysis <- lm(Temp ~ Month, data=airquality)
```

```{r}
summary(analysis)
```

```{r}
plot(airquality)
```

```{r}
s <- summary(analysis)
```

```{r}
s$coefficients[2,1]
```

#### More Packages

```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
```

#### Exploring the tidyverse

```{r}
aq.no.missing <-drop_na(airquality)
```

```{r}
head(aq.no.missing)
```

```{r}
library(tibble)
```

```{r}
space.revenues <- tibble(
  Industry = c(
    "Commercial Satellites Delivered",
    "Satellite Services",
    "Satellite Ground Equipment",
    "Commercial Launches",
    "Remote Sensing Data"
  ),
  `1990` = c(1000, 800, 860, 570, 155),
  `1991` = c(1300, 1200, 1300, 380, 190),
  `1992` = c(1300, 1500, 1400, 450, 210),
  `1993` = c(1100, 1850, 1600, 465, 250),
  `1994` = c(1400, 2330, 1970, 580, 300)
)
```

```{r}
space.revenues
```

```{r}
space.revenues["Satellite Services",2]
```
